name: Windows Defender Malware Detection History Deletion
description: Windows Defender logs when the history of detected infections is deleted. Log file will contain the message "Windows Defender Antivirus has removed history of malware and other potentially unwanted software".
false_positives: Deletion of Defender malware detections history for legitimate reasons
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Defender\/Operational AND event.code:1013 AND winlog.event_data.EventType:4)`
